concept.title: Token Card
concept.shortdesc: TokenCard is the visual representation of a token.

conbody.p: Token Cards instruct a wallet, a dapp browser or a website how to represent a token. This can include visible instructions, like icon, color, description or buttons. These visible properties are set with the <view> declaration. With it token issuers can design how the token appears in the wallet or on websites. You can think of it similar to a library of CSS code.
There are also invisible aspects of the token cards. They can define important security parameters and other technical properties which are useful for wallets to know.

A token card can have different properties in different circumstances. A soccer ticket token can change its appearance after the game started, and a car leasing token can show different properties depending on your position in the car leasing chain.
